attributes.action: Permit the Red Arrows a fly past at the 2012 Olynpics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have seen the Red Arrows perform both in The UK & in Abu Dhabi.
They show enormous skill in their daring & spectacular displays. They are the very top of the tree in aviation skills, & their displays thrilling & spoectacular. 
We ARE British. Is there something to be ashamed of about being British? - of course not. People flood to live in our country brcause they admire Britain.We are a country of culture, History, Traditions, beautiful countryside & architecture of which we are proud. Let our skills shine out in 2012  Let the Red Arrows soar!

rejection.details: Please see this office's response to the e-petition 'RedArrows2012' -http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16886
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
